project.name: C-C774A-SUBV-09-ST02-DT04-DF15-CF23-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a filename to read in the file contents using an fread operation within the function Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C774A-SUBV-09-ST02-DT04-DF15-CF23-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository Read an unsigned hex int from the input. If unsigned is > FFFF, do nothing. Otherwise, open that many files for writing, without closing the file handles. Output if any of the opens fail. The opens will fail if we try to open more than 1021 files.

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C774A-SUBV-09-ST02-DT04-DF15-CF23-01-GOOD-02

process.script: cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt
